title: High Half-Elf
content:
gic possess a hint of wild power.

High Half-Elf Traits:

High Elf Cantrip: Know one Cantrip of your choice from the wizard spell list using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability: Acid Splash: Hurl a bubble of acid that deals 1d6 Acid to each creature it hits. Blade Ward: Gain resistance to Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing damage from weapon attacks. Bone Chill: Assail a creature with the chill of the grave. It takes 1d8 Necrotic and cannot regain hit points. Undead creatures also get disa
